sentence.text: We recently reported a novel human phenotype resulting from a mutation in the critical coding region of the translation gene characterized by facial dysmorphism, severe growth restriction, axial hypotonia, global developmental delay and retinal pigmentary deposits.

We also describe a mouse model harboring a knockdown mutation in the murine translation gene that shared several of the phenotypic elements observed in the translation-deficient human including facial dysmorphism, growth restriction and retinal deposits.
